metadata.description: Specifies the location for all resources.
Specifies the environment of the deployment.
Specifies the prefix for all resources created in this deployment.
Specifies the tags that you want to apply to all resources.
Specifies whether firewall and private DNS Zones should be deployed.
Specifies the address space of the vnet.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is use for Azure Firewall.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for the services.
Specifies the private IP address of the central firewall. Optional if `enableDnsAndFirewallDeployment` is set to `true`.
Specifies the private IP addresses of the dns servers. Optional if `enableDnsAndFirewallDeployment` is set to `true`.
Specifies the resource ID of the Azure Firewall Policy. Optional parameter allows you to deploy Firewall rules to an existing Firewall Policy if `enableDnsAndFirewallDeployment` is set to `false`.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Key Vault. Optional if `enableDnsAndFirewallDeployment` is set to `true`.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Purview. Optional if `enableDnsAndFirewallDeployment` is set to `true`.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Queue storage. Optional if `enableDnsAndFirewallDeployment` is set to `true`.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Blob storage. Optional if `enableDnsAndFirewallDeployment` is set to `true`.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for EventHub namespaces. Optional if `enableDnsAndFirewallDeployment` is set to `true`.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Container Registry. Optional if `enableDnsAndFirewallDeployment` is set to `true`.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Synapse. Optional if `enableDnsAndFirewallDeployment` is set to `true`.

rules.name: MachineLearning-NetworkRule-001
rules.description: Allow outbound access to required services

rules.name: HDInsight-NetworkRule-001
rules.description: Allow default SQL servers provided by HDInsight

rules.name: HDInsight-NetworkRule-002
rules.description: Allows scale feature of HDInsight

rules.name: Databricks-NetworkRule-001
rules.description: Allow OAuth flow for the User to the Workspace Private Endpoint and features like Mount Points, Credential Passthrough, etc.

rules.name: Databricks-NetworkRule-002
rules.description: Required for workers communication with Azure Storage services and Databricks Webapp

rules.name: Databricks-NetworkRule-003
rules.description: Required for workers communication with Azure SQL services

rules.name: Databricks-NetworkRule-004
rules.description: Required for workers communication with Azure Eventhub services

rules.name: Azure-NetworkRule-001
rules.description: Allow Windows Activation in Azure through Azure KMS Service

rules.name: MachineLearning-ApplicationRule-001
rules.description: MachineLearning allow common FQDNs

rules.name: HDInsight-ApplicationRule-001
rules.description: HDInsight Service Tag Rule

rules.name: HDInsight-ApplicationRule-002
rules.description: Allows Windows login activity

rules.name: DataFactory-ApplicationRule-001
rules.description: Allows download of Self-hosted Integration Runtime installer and updates

rules.name: DataFactory-ApplicationRule-002
rules.description: Allows interactive authoring with Self-hosted Integration Runtime

rules.name: DataFactory-ApplicationRule-003
rules.description: Allows download of SHIR install script from GitHub

rules.name: Databricks-ApplicationRule-001
rules.description: Allows Secure Cluster Connectivity option

rules.name: Databricks-ApplicationRule-002
rules.description: Allows Databricks Setup Notebook to run successfully

rules.name: Azure-ApplicationRule-001
rules.description: Allows communication with Azure and Microsoft for Logging and Metrics as well as other services
